title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy model inference and chat inside Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you plug any Ollama-hosted model into LangChain pipelines and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, managing models and multi-user access.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating local LLMs via Ollama into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing Generator and Embedding components backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes showing how to run Ollama on GPUs, Kubernetes, mobile and with quantized models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for reproducible Ollama installs across Linux and macOS systems.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama and optional WebUI on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app demonstrating retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to AI agents for tool use and automation.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app that wraps Ollama with a modern chat interface for Windows/Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm and Q&A using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API for embedding in CLI tools.
